meanings.definition: A genus of climbing or trailing plants.
meanings.sent1: The smilax in the garden climbed up the trellis.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful smilax growing along the fence.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the smilax as a ladder to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a smilax, slowly but steadily climbing towards her goals.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green smilax added a touch of nature's beauty to the room.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Smilax.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist recommended using smilax for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The smilax in the forest had delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to experiment with adding smilax to the salad for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The smilax stood out in the garden like a rare gem among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the smilax filled the room with a refreshing scent.

meanings.definition: A woody vine with prickly stems.
meanings.sent1: Be careful of the smilax, its prickly stems can scratch you.
meanings.sent2: The smilax twisted around the tree trunk, reaching for the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got tangled in the smilax and had to be rescued.
meanings.sent4: The thorny smilax reminded her of the challenges she had overcome.
meanings.sent5: The dense smilax provided a natural barrier along the edge of the property.
